text: Eric Johannes (born 1962) is a former South African international lawn and indoor bowler. He won a bronze medal in the triples with Gidion Vermeulen and Neil Burkett at the 2006 Commonwealth Games in Melbourne. He lives in New South Wales in Australia and plays for the Warilla Bowls Club. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for South Africa Category:Bowls players at the 2006 Commonwealth Games Category:South African male bowls players Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
title: Eric Johannes
